title: Warranty Upgrade option, please !
content:
Warranty UPGRADE option:
 so (like so MANY people) my 4a has been reduced to junk status by its APPALLING WiFi performance.
I'm sending back under a WARRANTY claim;
 given that;
a) SO many people are having this problem
b) i bought this as first release direct from the Google Store
c) am a loyal Google customer
> WHY does Google not offer a warranty UPGRADE option to a new handset ?
this would go somewhere as an apology for what clearly is a very poor technically performance handset;
the offer of a warranty 'replacement' (ie by a 'refurbished handset') of the SAME known fault model is not acceptable.
NB i would not object to paying a little extra for a new replacement model.
